        Next scheduled event as a TimeSpec or null if none.

      • getPreviousEventTimestamp

        long getPreviousEventTimestamp()
        Returns timestamp of previousEvent for this task, i.e. last event that should have occurred before current time
        Returns:
        timestamp of previous event for this task.

      • getNextEvents

        List<TimeSpec> getNextEvents()
        Returns list of the next scheduled events for this task in increasing time order - ie the next event to occur appears first.
        Returns:
        Sorted list of TimeSpec's.
        See Also:
        getNextEvent()

      • onScheduledTime

        void onScheduledTime(ITimeSpec timeSpec)
        When this task is due to occur it will be called back on this method.
        Parameters:
        timeSpec - The TimeSpec that has expired requiring this task to be executed.
